TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit TextFragment extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains text and speech attribute information for consumption by a speech synthsizer engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets speech attribute information for a .
Docs.value: A instance is returned, or used to set speech attribute information for a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default value of this property is `null`.
Prosody information can be obtained from the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A> property on the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the length of the speech text in the fragment.
Docs.value: An is returned or can be used to set the length, in character, of the text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the starting location of the text in the fragment.
Docs.value: An is returned or can be used to set the start location, in character, of the part of text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.

Docs.summary: Sets or gets the speech text of the fragment.
Docs.value: A is returned or can be used to set the speech text to be used by a speech synthesis engine to generate audio output.
